question.questionText: Explain why you got a voltage reading of 0 for terminal 6 and the positive terminal.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Terminal 6 and the positive terminal are connected
Terminal 6 and the positive terminal are not separated by the gap
Terminal 6 and the positive terminal are not separated by the gap
terminal 6 is not connected to the negative battery terminal
There is no gap between terminal 6 and the positive terminal
terminal 6 is separated by a gap from the negative battery terminal
Terminal 6 and the positive battery terminal are in the same electrical state

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: the positive battery terminal is connected to terminal six
Terminal 6 is only connected to the positive terminal.
The positive battery terminal is separated by a gap from terminal 6
there is no gap between terminal 6 and the positive terminal.
A terminal is connected to the positive battery terminal.
The positive terminal is not separated by a gap from terminal 6
The positive battery terminal is not seperated from terminal 6.
The positive battery terminal was not separated by a gap from terminal 6.
